data.name: Positioned
data.description: Describes a class that has a position

data.name: Unique
data.description: Describes a class that has a unique identifier

data.name: Actor
data.description: Describes a class that has an AI controller

data.name: Physical
data.description: Describes a class that can be registered in the physics engine

data.name: GameNode
data.description: The primary representation of an object in the game world.

data.name: Scene
data.description: The current game world

data.name: CanvasNode
data.description: A GameNode that can be rendered to the screen

data.name: Graphic
data.description: A CanvasNode that is rendered purely through code.

data.name: Tilemap
data.description: A layer of a tilemap.

data.name: Sprite
data.description: A CanvasNode that is drawn from a loaded image

data.name: UIElement
data.description: A CanvasNode that can be interacted with in a user interface

data.name: Rect
data.description: A colored rectangle with a border

data.name: Point
data.description: A colored point

data.name: OrthogonalTilemap
data.description: A tilemap that is a 2D grid

data.name: AnimatedSprite
data.description: A sprite that has animation frames and can play different animations

data.name: Label
data.description: A UIElement that displays text

data.name: Slider
data.description: A UIElement that has an adjustable slider

data.name: Button
data.description: A label that can be clicked by the user

data.name: TextInput
data.description: A UIElement that can be typed in

data.name: GameNode
data.description: An object in the game world

data.name: Layer
data.description: A level of depth in the game world

data.name: Scene
data.description: The game world

data.name: SceneManager
data.description: An interface that handles scene lifecycles and scene switching

data.name: Game
data.description: The game

data.name: ResourceManager
data.description: A service that allows resources to be loaded from file and manages their lifecycles

data.name: FactoryManager
data.description: A service that allows for easy creation of GameNodes

data.name: SceneGraph
data.description: The data structure that handles scoping requests

data.name: AIManager
data.description: Maintains references to AI types and Actors in the game world

data.name: PhysicsManager
data.description: Provides an interface for managing physics movement.

data.name: NavigationManager
data.description: Maintains a list of navigation structures, and exposes functions for getting routes

data.name: TestPhysicsManager
data.description: Handles physics by assuming that all objects besides the current one are static

data.name: SceneGraphArray
data.description: Stores GameNodes in an array and iterates through the array for scoping

data.name: SceneGraphQuadTree
data.description: Stores GameNodes in a QuadTree and peforms AABB boundary checks for scoping

data.name: Scene
data.description: The game world

data.name: AIManager
data.description: Keeps a list of registered AI and Actors

data.name: Actor
data.description: A class that has an AI controller

data.name: GameNode
data.description: An object in the game world

data.name: AI
data.description: A strategy that controls an Actor

data.name: StateMachineAI
data.description: An AI that uses a push down automata to handle Actor state and perform actions

data.name: StateMachine
data.description: An implementation of a push down automata with hierarchical states
